data.title: HopscotchSongs
data.text:
Song by: Matt & Joanna Pace

We’re going on a trip to the 50 States

We’ll see their capitals and hear their traits

So hop in a car, ‘cause I just can’t wait

Let’s go and see the USA

We’re going on a trip to the 50 States

We’ll get there quick and we’ll get home late

So hop in a car, ‘cause I just can’t wait

Let’s go and see the USA

Let’s start with Phoenix, Arizona in the West

Then Salt Lake City, Utah, where the snow is the best

Cheyenne, Wyoming, Helena, Montana

Then on to independent Carson City, Nevada

Denver Colorado, Boise, Idaho

The oldest capital is Santa Fe, New Mexico

Juneau, Alaska is cold, I should warn ya

You’ll see a lot of trees in Sacramento, California

Olympia, Washington is sure to be a party

Then Salem, Oregon,

Honolulu, Hawaii

Then to the Midwest with Springfield, Illinois

Indianapolis, Indiana has races to enjoy

Then up in Michigan, the capital is Lansing

Then Madison, Wisconsin, where they have polka dancing

Columbus, Ohio is sure to impress,

But there’s even more to the Midwest

Topeka, Kansas, then Jefferson City, Missouri

Then Lincoln, Nebraska now there’s no need to hurry

Des Moines, Iowa, Pierre, South Dakota

Then Bismarck, North Dakota and St. Paul, Minnesota

The South has Dover, Delaware and Tallahassee, Florida

Annapolis, Maryland, and Atlanta, Georgia

Raleigh, North Carolina, Columbia, South Carolina

Richmond, Virginia, and Charleston, West Virginia

In Alabama, the capital is Montgomery,

We’ll go there for a BBQ and show up hungry

Frankfort, Kentucky, and Jackson, Mississippi

Nashville, Tennessee is called Music City

The capital of Arkansas is Little Rock And Baton Rouge,

Louisiana is the home of the green tree frog

Austin, Texas has parks that are pretty '

And the capital of Oklahoma is Oklahoma City

Then to Northeast and Augusta, Maine

Boston, Massachusetts had the first subway train

Concord, New Hampshire, Hartford, Connecticut

Providence, Rhode Island, then you’d better get

Up to Montpelier, Vermont

Where you can get all the maple syrup that you want

Delicious

Then to New York, where the capital is Albany

Trenton, New Jersey was a win for the colonies

Then take the 76 to Harrisburg, Pennsylvania

You better check out Harrisburg if history’s your mania

We’re going on a trip to the 50 States

We’ll see their capitals and hear their traits

So hop in a car, ‘cause I just can’t wait

Let’s go and see the USA

We’re going on a trip to the 50 States

We’ll get there quick and we’ll come home late

So hop in a car, ‘cause I just can’t wait

Let’s go and see the USA
